issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw: Hi @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , Thanks for the link. I will try that link now. Just eager to know, the first step says that `Make sure you have the SubT Simulator software installed either in a Docker container or as a Catkin workspace.` But later steps does not mention anything about docker container or catkin workspace. Does it mean that when we run the code, it automatically chooses the platform \(container or catkin\) ?
content.html: Hi @Alfredo Bencomo , Thanks for the link. I will try that link now. Just eager to know, the first step says that Make sure you have the SubT Simulator software installed either in a Docker container or as a Catkin workspace. But later steps does not mention anything about docker container or catkin workspace. Does it mean that when we run the code, it automatically chooses the platform (container or catkin) ?
